SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.slim3.datastore
Class GlobalTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.slim3.datastore.GlobalTransaction

public class GlobalTransaction
extends Object

The global transaction coordinator. If an error occurs during transaction, this transaction will be rolled back automatically.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
higa

get

public Entity get(Key key)
           throws NullPointerException,
                  EntityNotFoundRuntimeException,
                  ConcurrentModificationException,
                  IllegalStateException
Gets an entity specified by the key. If locking the entity failed, the other locks that this transaction has are released automatically.

Parameters:
key - the key
Returns:
an entity
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the key parameter is null
EntityNotFoundRuntimeException - if no entity specified by the key could be found
ConcurrentModificationException - if locking the entity specified by the key failed
IllegalStateException - if the number of locks in this global transaction exceeds 100

      throws NullPointerException,

             ConcurrentModificationException,
             IllegalStateException

a model

put

public Key put(Entity entity)
        throws NullPointerException,
               IllegalArgumentException,
               ConcurrentModificationException,
               IllegalStateException
Puts the entity. If locking the entity failed, the other locks that this transaction has are released automatically.

Parameters:
entity - the entity
Returns:
a key
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the entity parameter is null
IllegalArgumentException - if the size of the entity is more than 1,000,000 bytes
ConcurrentModificationException - if locking the entity specified by the key failed
IllegalStateException - if the number of locks in this global transaction exceeds 100 or if the number of journals in this global transaction exceeds 500

put

public Key put(Object model)
        throws NullPointerException,
               IllegalArgumentException,
               ConcurrentModificationException,
               IllegalStateException
Puts the model. If locking the entity failed, the other locks that this transaction has are released automatically.

Parameters:
model - the model
Returns:
a key
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the model parameter is null
IllegalArgumentException - if the size of the entity is more than 1,000,000 bytes
ConcurrentModificationException - if locking the entity specified by the key failed
IllegalStateException - if the number of locks in this global transaction exceeds 100 or if the number of journals in this global transaction exceeds 500

put

public List<Key> put(Iterable<?> models)
              throws NullPointerException,
                     IllegalArgumentException,
                     ConcurrentModificationException,
                     IllegalStateException
Puts the models. If locking the entities failed, the other locks that this transaction has are released automatically.

Returns:

commit

public void commit()
Commits this transaction. If multiple entity groups join this transaction, the roll-forward process is executed asynchronously.

rollback

public void rollback()
Rolls back this transaction.

rollbackAsync

protected void rollbackAsync()
Rolls back this transaction asynchronously.
